mapper.insert: insert into Auction (item_no, bid, reg_id) values (#{itemNo}, #{bid}, #{regId})
mapper.select: SELECT item_no, bid, reg_id FROM Auction WHERE item_no = #{itemNo} AND bid = (SELECT MAX(bid) FROM Auction WHERE item_no = #{itemNo})
select auction_no, item_no, bid, reg_id, reg_date from Auction where item_no = #{itemNo}
